chapters.name: Physical World
learning_objectives: Understand the nature of physical laws
Explore the relationship between physics, technology and society
Learn about fundamental forces in nature
Appreciate the scope and excitement of physics

chapters.name: Units & Measurements
topics: Measurement of Length, Mass and Time
Accuracy and Precision of Measuring Instruments
learning_objectives: Understand the International System of Units
Learn measurement techniques for length, mass and time
Learn about measurement errors and significant figures

chapters.name: Motion in a Straight Line
topics: Kinematic Equations for Uniformly Accelerated Motion
learning_objectives: Understand position, path length and displacement
Learn about average and instantaneous velocity
Apply kinematic equations for uniformly accelerated motion

chapters.name: Motion in a Plane
topics: Multiplication of Vectors by Real Numbers
Motion in a Plane with Constant Acceleration
learning_objectives: Study motion in a plane with constant acceleration
Understand projectile motion and uniform circular motion

chapters.name: Laws of Motion
learning_objectives: Master Newton's three laws of motion

chapters.name: Work, Power, Energy
topics: Work Done by a Constant Force
Work Done by a Variable Force
learning_objectives: Understand work done by constant and variable forces
Learn about kinetic and potential energy
Understand conservation of mechanical energy and power

chapters.name: System of Particles & Rotational Motion
topics: Linear Momentum of a System of Particles
learning_objectives: Study motion of centre of mass
Learn about linear momentum of particle systems
Understand angular motion concepts and conservation laws

chapters.name: Gravitation
learning_objectives: Understand Kepler's laws of planetary motion
Study gravitational constant and acceleration due to gravity
Understand gravitational potential energy and escape speed

chapters.name: Mechanical Properties of Fluids
topics: Pressure Due to a Fluid Column
learning_objectives: Understand pressure due to fluid columns
Learn Pascal's law and Archimedes' principle
Study streamline flow and Bernoulli's principle

chapters.name: Thermal Properties of Matter
learning_objectives: Study thermal expansion and specific heat capacity

chapters.name: Thermodynamics
learning_objectives: Study heat, internal energy and work
Master first and second laws of thermodynamics

chapters.name: Kinetic Theory
topics: Kinetic Theory of an Ideal Gas
learning_objectives: Learn kinetic theory of ideal gases
Understand equipartition of energy and mean free path

chapters.name: Oscillations
topics: Simple Harmonic Motion and Uniform Circular Motion
Velocity and Acceleration in Simple Harmonic Motion
learning_objectives: Study relationship with uniform circular motion
Understand energy in SHM and damped oscillations

chapters.name: Waves
topics: Displacement Relation for a Progressive Wave
The Speed of a Travelling Wave
learning_objectives: Learn displacement relations for progressive waves
Study wave speed and superposition principle

chapters.name: Some Basic Concepts of Chemistry
topics: Properties of Matter and their Measurement
learning_objectives: Learn about nature and properties of matter
Master laws of chemical combinations and atomic theory

chapters.name: Structure of Atom
topics: Discovery of Electron, Proton and Neutron
learning_objectives: Learn about atomic number, mass number and isotopes
Study various atomic models and their limitations

chapters.name: Classification of Elements & Periodicity in Properties
topics: Why do we need to Classify Elements?
Modern Periodic Law and the Present Form of Periodic Table
Nomenclature of Elements with Atomic Numbers > 100
Electronic Configurations of Elements and the Periodic Table
Electronic Configurations and Types of Elements
learning_objectives: Understand the need for element classification
Learn about genesis of periodic classification
Master modern periodic law and table structure
Study electronic configurations and element types

chapters.name: Chemical Bonding & Molecular Structure
topics: The Valence Shell Electron Pair Repulsion (VSEPR) Theory
learning_objectives: Learn about ionic bonds and bond parameters
Study VSEPR theory and valence bond theory

chapters.name: States of Matter (Gases & Liquids)
learning_objectives: Learn about thermal energy and interactions
Study gaseous state and gas laws

chapters.name: Thermodynamics
topics: Measurement of ΔU and ΔH: Calorimetry
Enthalpy Change, ΔrH of a Reaction
Enthalpies for Different Types of Reactions
learning_objectives: Study enthalpy changes for different reactions

chapters.name: Equilibrium
topics: Law of Chemical Equilibrium and Equilibrium Constant
learning_objectives: Understand equilibrium in physical and chemical processes

chapters.name: Redox Reactions
topics: Redox Reactions in Terms of Electron Transfer Reactions
learning_objectives: Learn electron transfer in redox reactions

chapters.name: Hydrogen
topics: Position of Hydrogen in the Periodic Table
learning_objectives: Understand hydrogen's position in periodic table
Learn about dihydrogen preparation and properties

chapters.name: s-Block Elements
topics: General Characteristics of the Compounds of the Alkali Metals
Biological Importance of Sodium and Potassium
learning_objectives: Study alkali metals and their compounds

chapters.name: Some p-Block Elements
topics: Important Trends and Anomalous Properties of Boron
Uses of Boron and Aluminium and their Compounds
Important Trends and Anomalous Properties of Carbon
learning_objectives: Study boron family elements and trends
Learn about boron compounds and uses
Understand carbon family elements and trends

chapters.name: Organic Chemistry: Basic Principles & Techniques
topics: Tetravalence of Carbon: Shapes of Organic Compounds
learning_objectives: Understand basic principles of organic chemistry
Learn about carbon tetravalence and compound shapes

chapters.name: Environmental Chemistry
learning_objectives: Study atmospheric, water and soil pollution

chapters.name: Biological Classification
learning_objectives: Learn about viruses, viroids and lichens

chapters.name: Plant Kingdom
topics: Plant Life Cycles and Alternation of Generations

chapters.name: Morphology of Flowering Plants
topics: Semi-technical Description of a Typical Flowering Plant
learning_objectives: Study root, stem and leaf morphology
Learn about fruit and seed morphology

chapters.name: Anatomy of Flowering Plants
topics: Anatomy of Dicotyledonous and Monocotyledonous Plants

chapters.name: Cell—Unit of Life
learning_objectives: Understand cell as unit of life

chapters.name: Biomolecules
topics: Nature of Bond Linking Monomers in a Polymer
Dynamic State of Body Constituents—Concept of Metabolism
learning_objectives: Learn about proteins, polysaccharides and nucleic acids

chapters.name: Transport in Plants
topics: Uptake and Transport of Mineral Nutrients
Phloem Transport: Flow from Source to Sink
learning_objectives: Understand means of transport in plants
Learn about transpiration and mineral transport

chapters.name: Mineral Nutrition
topics: Methods to Study the Mineral Requirements of Plants
Soil as Reservoir of Essential Elements
learning_objectives: Study methods to determine mineral requirements
Learn about absorption and translocation mechanisms

chapters.name: Photosynthesis in Higher Plants
topics: How many Pigments are involved in Photosynthesis?
Where are the ATP and NADPH Used?
learning_objectives: Learn about C4 pathway and photorespiration

chapters.name: Respiration in Plants
learning_objectives: Learn about aerobic respiration and respiratory quotient

chapters.name: Plant Growth & Development
learning_objectives: Learn about plant growth regulators and photoperiodism

chapters.name: Digestion & Absorption
learning_objectives: Learn about absorption and digestive disorders

chapters.name: Breathing & Exchange of Gases
learning_objectives: Learn about gas exchange and transport

chapters.name: Body Fluids & Circulation
learning_objectives: Learn about cardiac regulation and disorders

chapters.name: Excretory Products & Elimination
topics: Mechanism of Concentration of the Filtrate
Role of other Organs in Excretion
learning_objectives: Learn about urine formation and regulation

chapters.name: Locomotion & Movement
topics: Disorders of Muscular and Skeletal System
learning_objectives: Learn about skeletal system and joints

chapters.name: Neural Control & Coordination
learning_objectives: Learn about reflex actions and sensory processing

chapters.name: Chemical Coordination & Integration
topics: Hormones of Heart, Kidney and Gastrointestinal Tract

chapters.name: Sets
learning_objectives: Learn about empty, finite and infinite sets
Study subsets, power sets and universal sets
Master set operations and Venn diagrams

chapters.name: Relations and Functions
learning_objectives: Learn about function graphs and algebra

chapters.name: Trigonometric Functions
topics: Domain and Range of Trigonometric Functions
learning_objectives: Master domain and range of trig functions

chapters.name: Mathematical Induction
learning_objectives: Apply mathematical induction to prove statements

chapters.name: Complex Numbers and Quadratic Equations
topics: The Modulus and the Conjugate of a Complex Number
learning_objectives: Study modulus, conjugate and Argand plane

chapters.name: Linear Inequalities
topics: Algebraic Solutions of Linear Inequalities in One Variable and their Graphical Representation
Graphical Solution of Linear Inequalities in Two Variables
Solution of System of Linear Inequalities in Two Variables
learning_objectives: Solve linear inequalities algebraically and graphically

chapters.name: Binomial Theorem
topics: Binomial Theorem for Positive Integral Indices
learning_objectives: Understand binomial theorem for positive integral indices

chapters.name: Sequences and Series
topics: Sum to n Terms of Special Series
learning_objectives: Learn about arithmetic and geometric means

chapters.name: Straight Lines
topics: Various Forms of the Equation of a Line
Distance of a Point From a Line
learning_objectives: Understand basic concepts of straight lines
Learn about slope of a line
Study various forms of line equations
Calculate distance from point to line

chapters.name: Conic Sections
learning_objectives: Study circle, parabola, ellipse and hyperbola

chapters.name: Introduction to Three-Dimensional Geometry
topics: Coordinate Axes and Coordinate Planes in Three Dimensional Space
Coordinates of a Point in Space
learning_objectives: Learn coordinates of points in space

chapters.name: Limits and Derivatives
topics: Derivatives of Polynomial and Trigonometric Functions
learning_objectives: Find derivatives of polynomial and trigonometric functions

chapters.name: Statistics
learning_objectives: Learn about range and mean deviation

chapters.name: Overview of a Computer
learning_objectives: Learn about computer evolution and generations

chapters.name: Input, Output and Memory Devices
learning_objectives: Study various input and output devices
Learn about primary and secondary memory

chapters.name: Data Representation
learning_objectives: Learn binary arithmetic and computer codes

chapters.name: Software Concepts
learning_objectives: Distinguish between system and application software
Study types and features of operating systems

chapters.name: Object-Oriented Concepts
learning_objectives: Understand advantages and disadvantages of OOP

chapters.name: Data Types
learning_objectives: Study modifier and derived data types

chapters.name: Control Statements
learning_objectives: Learn jump statements and nested structures

chapters.name: Functions
learning_objectives: Understand header files and library functions
Study math, character and string functions

chapters.name: User-Defined Functions
learning_objectives: Learn function calling and argument passing
Study scope, lifetime and array arguments

chapters.name: Structures
learning_objectives: Learn structure initialization and member access
Study nested structures and arrays of structures

chapters.name: Word Processing
learning_objectives: Study advanced features and document management

chapters.name: Spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Study data analysis and advanced features
